        private boolean maxMin

    • Constructor Detail

      • SortComparator

        public SortComparator(boolean maxMin)
        Parameters:
        maxMin - It determines how the selection should be ordered. If maxMin = true The selection was ordered of bigger to smaller. If maxMin = false The selection was ordered of smaller to bigger.

      • SortComparator

        public SortComparator()
        It determines like the selection should be ordered. If maxMin = false The selection was ordered of smaller to bigger.

      • isMaxMin

        public boolean isMaxMin()
        Returns:
        How the selection is ordered. If maxMin = true The selection was ordered of bigger to smaller. If maxMin = false The selection was ordered of smaller to bigger.
